company.name: Heru (YC S19)
company.description:
Do it right.

There are +145 M independent workers in Latin America who want to professionalize their services and be up to date with the regional changes. Latin America is undergoing structural changes, digital wallets and card payments are surpassing cash payments for the first time in the region which means these independent workers have to become more efficient under the new digital economy. We're here to help that change happen.
